summary: At the request of Congress, GAO reviewed the status of all open recommendations we made to the Department of State and the Agency for International Development in 2015 and 2016. During calendar years 2015 and 2016, we made 132 recommendations to State and USAID. As of June 7, 2018: Of the 82 recommendations made to State, 37 (about 45 percent) were still open, and 10...
title: State and USAID: Status of GAO Recommendations Made in 2015 and 2016
